parameter.name: Description
parameter.defaultValue: This group contains parameters that have no additional attributes, just a name and a type.

parameter.name: Reference
parameter.defaultValue: This group contains parameters that have no additional attributes, just a name and a type.

parameter.name: Z Range
parameter.defaultValue: Set the ZRange for the output data. If the initial layout is planar (i.e. all z coordinates are zero), the coordinates will be evenly spaced from 0.0 to ZRange. The default is zero, which has no effect.

parameter.name: Angle
parameter.defaultValue: The sweep angle of the tree - this can be between 0 and 360.

parameter.name: Log Spacing Value
parameter.defaultValue: The spacing of tree levels. Levels near zero give more space to levels near the root, while levels near one (the default) create evenly-spaced levels. Levels above one give more space to levels near the leaves. .

parameter.name: Leaf Spacing
parameter.defaultValue: The spacing of leaves. Levels near 1 evenly space leaves with no gaps between subtrees. Levels near zero creates large gaps between subtrees.

parameter.name: Distance Array Name
parameter.defaultValue: Set the array to use to determine the distance from the root.

parameter.name: Rotation
parameter.defaultValue: The amount of counter-clockwise rotation to apply after the layout.
